Title: Balaji: A tale of kings
Description: Balaji punjab is on a quest to defeat his evil brother and become king of the promised land

Title: Justice Leauge
Description: Bruce Wayne is determined not to let Superman's ultimate sacrifice be in vain. That is why he makes a plan with Diana Prince to put together a team of meta-people.

Title: Tenet
Description: A secret agent's mission is to prevent a third world war. An important part of the operation is the mysterious keyword 'Tenet'.

Title: American Assassin
Description: Together with veteran Stan, Mitch is assigned by the CIA to investigate a wave of attacks. They discover a pattern and go on a common mission: to stop a world war in the Middle East.

Title: 21 Bridges
Description: While hunting down two murderers, a police officer finds himself in a large-scale plot involving his colleagues. He has to figure out who to hunt ... and who is hunting him.

Title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Description: Harry has always felt left out by his family. On his eleventh birthday, he learns that his dead parents were two powerful magicians. He also has magical powers and is therefore allowed to go to school at Hogwarts.

Title: Toy Story 3
Description: A lot has happened in recent years. Andy has aged and is about to go to college. The toys are tense and nervous because what's going to happen to them now that Andy is leaving?

Title: Scooby!
Description: After hundreds of solved cases and joint adventures, they are confronted with their biggest, most challenging mystery yet: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus on Earth.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: the Curse of the Black Pearl
Description: When the governor's daughter is kidnapped by the dangerous Captain Barbossa, her friend Will enlists the help of pirate hero Jack Sparrow. However, the two do not know that there is a curse on their opponents.

Title: Ferry
Description: Ferry is a 2021 crime thriller directed by Cecilia Verheyden. The film is a prequel to the fiction series Undercover, and, like the series, was produced by the production company De Mannen. The film is a prequel to the first season of Undercover.

Title: De Oost
Description: De Oost is a Dutch war film from 2020, directed by Jim Taihuttu.

Title: De Beentjes van Sint Hildegard
Description: De Beentjes van Sint-Hildegard is a Dutch film from 2020 starring Herman Finkers and Johanna ter Steege. The film is largely spoken in the Twente regional language. The film is based on the screenplay of the 2016 Czech movie Teorie tygra.

Title: After
Description: After is a 2019 film directed by Jenny Gage, based on the Anna Todd book series.

Title: Ready Player One
Description: Ready Player One is a 2018 American science fiction film directed by Steven Spielberg, based on Ernest Cline's book of the same name.

Title: No Escape
Description: No Escape, also known as Follow Me, is a 2020 American horror mystery film written and directed by Will Wernick and starring Keegan Allen, Holland Roden, Denzel Whitaker, Ronen Rubinstein, Pasha D. Lychnikoff, George Janko and Siya.

Title: Overlord
Description: Overlord is a 2018 American horror action war film directed by Julius Avery. Lead roles are played by Jovan Adepo, Wyatt Russell, Mathilde Ollivier, John Magaro, Gianny Taufer, Pilou Asb√¶k, Bokeem Woodbine and Iain De Caestecker. The film was produced by J.J.

Title: The Nun
Description: The Nun is a 2018 American horror film directed by Corin Hardy and written by Gary Dauberman. The film is a spin-off of The Conjuring 2 and is the fifth film in The Conjuring Universe.

Title: Crawl
Description: Crawl is a 2019 American disaster horror film directed by Alexandre Aja and starring Kaya Scodelario and Barry Pepper.

Title: Honest Thief
Description: Honest Thief is a 2020 American action thriller film directed by Mark Williams from a screenplay by Williams and Steve Allrich.

Title: The Little Things
Description: The Little Things is a 2021 American crime thriller written and directed by John Lee Hancock. The lead roles are played by Denzel Washington, Rami Malek and Jared Leto.

Title: 21 Bridges
Description: 21 Bridges is a 2019 American action thriller film directed by Brian Kirk and written by Adam Mervis and Matthew Michael Carnahan, based on a story by Mervis.
